items.sentence: My gut-feeling is that Tom isn't responsible for this mess.
I couldn't light the candle because the wick was too short.
Based on the customer reviews, it's a very good restaurant.
Both Tom and Mary were overweight when they were teenagers.
Do you think that anybody will care if Tom doesn't do that?
I think that it's highly unlikely that Tom will write back.
I wouldn't have come if I'd known Tom was going to be here.
Tom and Mary were talking to each other during the concert.
If you don't follow safety procedures, you may get injured.
I realized Tom wasn't laughing and wondered what was wrong.
No matter what you do, you're not going to get me to laugh.
The sight of a familiar face made me feel more comfortable.
If you're lucky, Tom will let you drive his new sports car.
I couldn't believe that no one thought my jokes were funny.
I couldn't believe that nobody thought my jokes were funny.
Every girlfriend that Tom has ever had has been named Mary.
I'd like to see what would happen if you tried to kiss Tom.
Didn't you know Tom and I used to be married to each other?
What sort of jewelry are you going to wear with this dress?
Tom got a brain freeze after eating his ice cream too fast.
